source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Microsoft PowerPoint - PowerPoint from Beginner to Advanced

visible_instructors.title: Kirt Kershaw
visible_instructors.job_title: Microsoft Certified Trainer - Training Microsoft Since 2000!
visible_instructors.name: Kirt

items.headline: PowerPoint A-Z Course - Microsoft PowerPoint 2010, 2013, 2016, 2019 and 365 by Microsoft PowerPoint Certified Specialist
objectives_summary: Create a PowerPoint presentation from scratch
Add animation to text, shapes and pictures
Learn how to create handouts and speaker notes

items.title: MS Office 2013: 10-in-1 Courses To Maximize Productivity
items.headline: Comprehensive, all-in-one training to get the most out of Microsoft Office 2013. 10-in-1 courses with 80 hours of video.
objectives_summary: Introductory tutorials for Microsoft Excel 2013
Introductory tutorials for Microsoft Word 2013
Introductory tutorials for Microsoft Outlook 2013

items.title: Microsoft Excel Training - Beginner to Advanced Level

visible_instructors.job_title: Microsoft Certified Trainer & Microsoft office Specialist
visible_instructors.title: Ramzan Rajani
visible_instructors.name: Ramzan

items.headline: Learn from Microsoft Excel Specialist & Certified Trainer
objectives_summary: You will learn how to create Summary Reports with Interactive Dashboard with Pivot table
You will be able to create Stunning Charts  (Column, Line & Pie)
Will be comfortable in writing your own IF Conditions and Multiple Level of IFs with examples

items.title: Excel 2010 Intermediate
items.headline: Learn how to take Excel to the next level with charts, workbooks, range names and so much more
objectives_summary: Effectively use workbooks
Understand the benefits of range names
Apply outlines and work with subtotals

items.title: Microsoft Power Pivot (Excel) and SSAS (Tabular DAX model)

visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor - over 350,000 students so far
visible_instructors.title: Phillip Burton
visible_instructors.name: Phillip

items.headline: Visualise Data in Power Pivot for Excel or SSAS with DAX. 70-779, 70-768 exams.  Business Intelligence PowerPivot tool.
objectives_summary: Extract data from multiple tables.
Create connections between the tables.
Develop the model using DAX functions.

items.title: MIS Training - Advance Excel + Macro  + Access + SQL
items.headline: MIS Reporting and Analysis Training - Complete Data Management with Basic to Expert level Excel and Automation Macro
objectives_summary: Advance Level Excel
Expertise in Using Text Function
Expertise in Using Logical Function

items.title: How to Create Excel Gantt charts and Timelines in Minutes !
items.headline: A great tool to Manage simple Projects efficiently. Project Management with Excel. Plan, Control and Execute Projects.
objectives_summary: Create dynamic Gantt charts and Timelines in Minutes using Excel Charts.
See the Project unfolding in most logical manner against Project Timeline.
Plan,Monitor and control Project efficiently.

items.title: Excel Guru: The Only Excel Formulas Course You’ll Ever Need
items.headline: Microsoft Excel:  Master Excel Formulas by Solving 100s of Problems in Excel. Can Use Excel 2003 - Excel 2016 (Excel)
objectives_summary: Become an Excel formula master who is proficient in reading and writing even the most complex formulas in Excel.
Understand the majority of Excel’s built in functions and how to use them to efficiently solve a wide range of problems with Excel.
Creatively write formulas in Excel to address complex practical problems by combining Excel's functions together.

items.title: Microsoft Excel - Excel from Beginner to Advanced & VBA

visible_instructors.title: Brian Wells
visible_instructors.name: Brian
visible_instructors.job_title: A Dedicated Instructor That Will Help You Excel

items.headline: Master Excel with this A-Z Microsoft Excel Course (Microsoft Excel 2013, Excel 2016, and Excel 2019)
objectives_summary: Master Excel from Beginner to Advanced + Macros & VBA!
Learn Excel Formulas & Functions and perform complex Calculations
Create dynamic reports by mastering one of the most popular tools, Pivot Tables

items.title: Microsoft Project 2019: Beginner to Advanced Mega Bundle
items.headline: Claim 16 PDUs as this Microsoft Project 2019 course takes you from Project novice to superstar project manager
objectives_summary: Includes a project task and downloadable exercises that you build out as you complete the course
Start by learning the basics of Project by setting up tasks
Learn all about Critical Paths in MS Project and the Gantt view

items.title: Fundamentals of Microsoft Planner
items.headline: Learn All The Essentials of Microsoft Planner
objectives_summary: Learn all the essentials of Microsoft Planner.
How to create a plan and add tasks to that plan.
How to organize and sort tasks.

items.title: Microsoft Project : How to Build a Detailed Project Plan
items.headline: Clear Concise Steps to Building a Project Plan in Microsoft Project. Become a professional in under an hour
objectives_summary: Build a Functional Project Plan
Navigate fluently throughout Microsoft Project
Analyze and Interpret a Project Plan

items.title: Introduction to Microsoft Project 2010
items.headline: Learn the basics of using Microsoft Project 2010
objectives_summary: Learning the Project 2010 interface
Project tasks
The basics of working with resources

items.title: Microsoft Access VBA: Automating Import of Excel Files
items.headline: Learn how to completely automate the periodic import of Excel files!
objectives_summary: Perform several advanced Microsoft Access techniques that will enable them to create more robust database systems

items.title: Microsoft Excel 2016 Mac 1: Beginner-Specialist Certificate

visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor - over 350,000 students so far
visible_instructors.title: Phillip Burton
visible_instructors.name: Phillip

items.headline: Get certified! Levels 1-5 for Microsoft Excel for Mac 2016. Covers Excel exam 77-727
objectives_summary: Create, configure and save Excel worksheets and workbooks.
Navigate through and format worksheets and workbooks.
Customise options and views for worksheets and workbooks.

items.title: Microsoft Excel Logic Theory and If Functions (Intermediate)
items.headline: Learn the beauty of Logic Functions so that Excel does the hard work of sorting your data for you!
objectives_summary: Logic function theory
"If" function variations
"And" funtion
